clinical_note: Dog, 9 years old, Beagle. Skin lesions with hair loss, intense itching, secondary bacterial infection. Worse in summer months.
Cat, 6 years old, Ragdoll. Difficulty defecating, hard dry stool, straining. Appetite normal, otherwise healthy.
Bird, 5 years old, African Grey. Plucking feathers, self-mutilation behavior, loud vocalizations. Recent change in environment.
